title: Is the bull market over? Probably not, strategist says - Yahoo Finance
content: Is the bull market over? Probably not, strategist says  Yahoo Finance
description: Although the S&P 500 has yet to return to the peaks it reached around the turn of the new year, the stock market has recently gained traction to bounce back from mid-March lows. LPL Financial Chief Market Strategist Ryan Detrick provided some context surrounding the current state of the market with regard to bull markets seen in prior decades.
